name: Ian Stuart Donaldson
description: '''Ian Stuart Donaldson''' (11 August 1957 â€“ 24 September 1993), more commonly known as '''Ian Stuart''', was an English [[neo-Nazi]] musician. He was best known as the front-man of [[Skrewdriver]], originally a [[Punk rock|punk]] band which, from 1983 onwards, he rebranded as a [[Rock Against Communism]] [[white power skinhead]] band. He raised money through [[white power]] concerts with his [[Blood & Honour]] network.
